thread.title: All systems go for Fashion Week
thread.title_full: All systems go for Fashion Week

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: All systems go for Fashion Week
text:
Drive around downtown and you'll notice a huge tent pitched on Main Street. That's a signal that Fashion Week of Rochester is set to get underway Tuesday, Oct. 13. For the first time, Fashion Week of Rochester will host its runway shows in one location under a large tent similar to fashion weeks in larger cities. The 15,000-square-foot tent will feature a nearly 100-foot raised runway, seating and standing for more than 900 people and a retail and food vendor area.
ROCHESTER DEMOCRAT AND CHRONICLE
5 reasons to care about Fashion Week
Fashion Week 2015 kicks off with a free Fashion Exchange at the tent where people can trade in gently used items from their closets with something new.
The week's five runway shows start Wednesday, Oct. 14, and continue through Saturday Oct. 17. The annual shopping event, the Boutique Crawl, will round out the week Sunday, Oct. 18.
ROCHESTER DEMOCRAT AND CHRONICLE
What to wear to Fashion Week
Tickets can be purchased at Wegmans.
Proceeds benefit The Center's homeless youth shelters and programs.
For more details, visit fashionweekofrochester.org.
MCHAO@Gannett.com
